rooms.description: Spacious foyer with Art Deco accents and minimalistic design.
Open plan living area incorporating Art Deco design elements such as geometric patterns and rich colors, with a large central chandelier.
Modern dining area with Art Deco style tables and chairs, perfect for hosting guests.
A comfortable guest room designed with Art Deco motifs and ample storage, aligning with Vastu principles for peace.
Larger master bedroom featuring an Art Deco en-suite bathroom, intricate detailing, and a private balcony.
A dedicated study area with Art Deco style furnishings and ample natural light, promoting productivity.

A large balcony offering panoramic views of the garden, incorporating Art Deco railings and decorative lighting.
